title: Complicated Christmas
description: Life is full of complications, so why not have an uncomplicated arrangement between friends?Former figure skater Caitlin Aimes doesn't care to make life complicated. Publicly humiliated by her ex-fianc√© years ago, she closes herself off to relationships and love. She never thought she'd be that girl- the one having a friends-with-benefits relationship. No complications, right?Wrong. This holiday season, the unexpected happens, catching Caitlin and Ron off guard...Ron Mercer lost his wife four years ago and has no plans to commit himself to another relationship. Life as a widower with two teenagers is already complicated enough. But in a world constantly changing, he finds himself in a predicament he never expected....The arrangement they made has consequences which neither ever prepared for. Caitlin and Ron are in for a Christmas like they'd never had before.
author: Nikki Lynn Barrett
